column2: "Poppoâ™ª To remind you, my name is Popona, and I've come from the world of \"Idola\"!"
"I'll be conducting PR exercises here for a while to help people get to know Idola and the Aries White Knights!"
"According to my sources, enemies on each planet are growing violent, and there aren't enough people available to deal with them."
"If you go out and beat them all up, maybe those other people will have time to come by and hear about the Knights!"
"Please, help me out. I'm looking forward to seeing you in action!"
